alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 1:28PM MST until November 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and gusty winds. In the west-central Idaho mountains total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in valleys, with 5 to 10 inches in the mountains. In Baker County 1 to 3 inches in valleys with 5 to 10 inches in the mountains. In the Boise Mountains, total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in valleys, with 7 to 12 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph tonight. * WHERE...In Idaho, West Central Mountains and Boise Mountains zones. In Oregon, Baker County zone. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will produce blowing snow which could quickly cover roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
